thought: To craft polished_blackstone_pressure_plate, I need to place 2 polished_blackstone blocks next to each other in the crafting grid. I have 2 polished_blackstone blocks in my inventory at slot 18, so I will start by moving one to the crafting grid in slot 1.
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
